entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Tulita
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:30 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -35.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Tulita Airport 3:00 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022
Temperature: -35.3°C
Pressure: 104.3 kPa
Humidity: 71 %
Wind Chill: -44
Dewpoint: -38.7°C
Wind: NE 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 43.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 43. Wind chill minus 52 this evening and minus 57 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 31.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow beginning late in the morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 31. Wind chill minus 55 in the morning and minus 44 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 33. Wind chill near minus 47. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022
